scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This material includes 8 items, consisting of bible records, 1765-1912, for the Crissey, Colon, and Moserfamilies. The Crissey familyrecords include an entry for the marriage of Ethel Crisseyto Francis Lewis Berkeleyon April 5, 1905. Also included is the gilt decorated leather board front cover, engraved "To My Father & Mother John & Charlotte Crissey Christmas 1847." There is also a document on the dedication of the Church of St. John the Evangeliststating that the corner stone was laid by Joseph Marshall on October 1, 1845. Two ribbons with cross designs, probably used as bookmarks in Bibles, are also included.
